title: Crime Alert 11.13.20
itunes:title: Crime Alert 11.13.20
description:
Bold thief reaches into woman's pocket to steal her car keys. Uber rider assaults driver after being asked to wear a mask.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
